content: continue dpns= double pointed needles increase= increase m= marker patt= pattern pm= place marker p = purl rem= remain ning repeat= repeat round=round rs= right side sl = slip ssk = slip 1 st as if to knit slip a second st as if to knit knit them together through the back loop st s = stitch es st st = stockinette st decrease = together ws= wrong side p l y m o u t h y a r n® f595 d e s i g n s t u d i o f r e e w i t h y a r n p u r c h a s e next round remove m bobble 2 sts k to end of round 46 48 50 sts set sleeve aside and make another sleeve yoke- remember you are joining the sleeves together with the body at this point- you will be working across the right front then the right sleeve then the back then the left sleeve then the left front when working this section you may find it difficult for the first couple row to work across the sleeve sts since the underarm bobble is very small you may want to try using the dpns for each section instead of the circular with all rs facing k24 27 30 sts k2tog k1 from right front pm k1 ssk k40 42 44 sts k2tog k1 from one sleeve pm k1 ssk k53 57 63 sts k2tog k1 from back pm k1 ssk k40 42 44 sts k2tog k1 from one sleeve pm k1 ssk k24 27 30 sts from left front 8 sts decrease d 197 211 227 sts read through entire section before proceeding you will be shaping the front neck as well as the raglan seams at the same time row 2 ws p all sts decrease row rs *k to 3 sts before m k2tog k1 sl m k1 ssk repeat from * 3 times more k to end of row 8 sts decrease d 189 203 219 sts cont to work the decrease every rs row 16 18 19 times more while working every other ws row in k to create a ridge 128 144 152 sts decrease d at the same time decrease 1 st at each neck edge on next and following 4th row 7 6 8 times 47 47 51 sts rem when all shaping is complete- 2 4 4 sts for each front 23 23 27 sts for the back 10 8 8 sts for each sleeve place sts onto a holder front band with rs facing and circular needle pick up and k 33 36 45 sts along the right front to neck shaping pick up and k 27 30 33 sts along the neck shaping to sts on holder k 47 47 51 sts from holder pick up and k 27 30 33 sts along the left neck shaping pick up and k 33 36 45 sts
